M

main - package main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.PacmanGame
The entry point of this game.
mainFrame - Variable in class main.CoreEngine
 
mainPanel - Variable in class main.CoreEngine
 
makeInvulnerable(long) - Method in class entity.PacmanEntity
 
Map - Class in main
The Map class is used to contain all relevant information about a particular level; All levels are loaded at start-up, and their map file is parsed, checked and stored to be used by the game when spawning Pacman, ghosts, walls, and point pickups.
Map(int[], int, String) - Constructor for class main.Map
Private constructor for the Map.
mapController - Variable in class main.PacmanGame
The MapController is used to load the games levels, and spawn entities at their specified locations.
MapController - Class in controllers
The MapController is responsible for storing all the Pacman levels, and providing these levels to the game on request.
MapController(PacmanGame) - Constructor for class controllers.MapController
The MapController constructor, attempts to load the maps from the 'resources/maps/' directory and handles any arising exceptions.
mapping - Variable in class controllers.CollisionController
The MapController from the game instance used when testing if the collision provided is intersecting part of the map/walls.
mapRoot - Variable in class controllers.MapController
 
maps - Variable in class controllers.MapController
 
maxDepth - Variable in class main.PathFinder
The maximum amount of steps that will be evaluated before we give up.
maxFrames - Variable in class entity.PacmanEntity
The amount of frames that exist when representing the PacmanEntity.
measureTime() - Method in class main.CoreEngine
 
MENU - main.PacmanGame.STATE
 
menuFragment - Variable in class main.PacmanGame
The fragment used when the game is in MENU state
MenuFragment - Class in fragment
This fragment is used to display the main menu
MenuFragment(PacmanGame) - Constructor for class fragment.MenuFragment
Constructs the fragment
mLoopClip - Variable in class main.SoundEffect
Loop Clip - usually null unless the clip is played in a looped fashion, in which case this is populated with a Clip (from AudioSystem.getClip) which is loaded with this sound effect and told to loop.

move(double) - Method in class entity.PacmanEntity
Moves the PacmanEntity in it's current direction based on the per-second-velocity, and the amount of time that has passed since the last update (dt).
moveGhost(Entity.DIRECTION, int) - Method in class entity.ghost.GhostEntity
Moves the ghost by the distance provided in the direction provided
moveTowardsStep(int) - Method in class entity.ghost.GhostEntity
This method will attempt to move the ghost towards a point.
